summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6279 for the improvement of the alley in Block 9, University Gardens Addition, being the alley between 38th Ave. Northeast and 39th Ave. Northeast from Northeast 60th Street to Northeast 62nd Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 91900, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
